name: Ball! (itch) (OP Games)
description:
Ball! 2 players 1 computer. Play with your friend on the same computer.

Ball is a Pong based game made in Godot game engine.

Blue player key input (W and S)

Pink player key input (arrow up and arrow Down)

Credits:

Steven benoit Jr: Game programmer

Ann benoit: Art Designer

Operation Games: Publisher

Godot: Game Engine
